# Dependencies

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)

```

# Load data

```{r}

data(mtcars)

mtcars <- mtcars |>
  mutate(mpg = mpg + 2)

```

# Plot

```{r}

ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, wt, color = as.factor(gear))) +
  geom_point()

```
